<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Scholarly Recollection](/Spells.aspx?ID=450)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 396 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You attempt a Perception check to Seek, or you attempt a skill check to Recall Knowledge with a skill you're trained in.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Speaking a short prayer as you gather your thoughts, you're blessed to find that your deity gave you just the right bit of information for your situation. Roll the triggering check twice and use the better result.
name: Scholarly Recollection
